actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to provide for construction of certain bridges, approaches, and roads in the Canal Zone within the framework of continued sovereign control of the Panama Canal and the Canal Zone by the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Governor of the Canal Zone to construct: (1) a bridge across the Atlantic sea level portion of the Panama Canal; (2) a bridge across the Charges River in the Canal Zone; and (3) the necessary roads to provide appropriate highway connections for each bridge. Authorizes the use of the Panama Canal Company's services and facilities.

titles.title: A bill to provide for construction of certain bridges, approaches, and roads in the Canal Zone within the framework of continued sovereign control of the Panama Canal and the Canal Zone by the United States, and for other purposes.
